document.full_text: american spencer levin maintained his position at the top of the leaderboard in the second round of the arnold palmer invitational on friday while tiger woods moved into contention.
document.title: levin stays on top at bay hill, woods closes in with a 68
lines_and_colors: american spencer levin maintained his position at the top of the leaderboard in the second round of the arnold palmer invitational on friday while tiger woods moved into contention.
